text: We need action, not more empty words from President Trump. It’s time for him to step up and do his job. https://t.co/TBpXhoAg1P

urls.title: Biden trashes Trump over coronavirus response: 'Step up and do your job, Mr. President'
urls.description: On a conference call with reporters, Biden laid out all the things he felt Trump had done wrong — and what he'd do differently.
